events.title: Science and Engineering Garden Party
events.abstract:
The Archimedeans are proud to co-host the Science and Engineering Garden Party, to be held on Friday 15th June from 1pm–4pm on Pembroke College Library Lawn. Benefits include:

  • Food, including cheese.
  • Pimms, as is traditional.
  • Live music: The Funk Nuggets. They are a band.

Pembroke has a map of their grounds; the Library Lawn is the lawn in front of the library.
